name: Weekend Program & Drop-In Child Care
description: Drop-in and weekend program is designed for children aged 4 months to 6 years. While it complements our weekday program, it also stands independently—families are welcome to enroll their children without prior participation in the weekday sessions.
fullDescription: Drop-in and weekend program is designed for children aged 4 months to 6 years. While it complements our weekday program, it also stands independently—families are welcome to enroll their children without prior participation in the weekday sessions.
whatTheyOffer: Drop-in and weekend program is designed for children aged 4 months to 6 years. While it complements our weekday program, it also stands independently—families are welcome to enroll their children without prior participation in the weekday sessions.
howToGetIt: Use online registration and reservation TOOL
cost: This is a fee based service
